# shared

**Type Property**

A shared object that stores rights.

## Declaration

```swift
class var shared: LARightStore { get }
```

## Accessing rights

- **right(forIdentifier:completion:)**: Fetches a previously stored right from the shared right store.

items.description: Fetches a previously stored right from the shared right store.
